OTP.title: OTP Verification
OTP.message: Your verification code is {otpCode}. Valid for {expiresIn} minutes.

PASSWORD_RESET.title: Password Reset Request
PASSWORD_RESET.message: You have requested to reset your password. Click to proceed.

PHONE_VERIFIED.title: Phone Verified
PHONE_VERIFIED.message: Your phone number {phone} has been successfully verified.

CENTER_CREATED.title: Center Created Successfully
CENTER_CREATED.message: Your learning center {center.name} has been successfully created! You can now start managing your center.

CENTER_UPDATED.title: Center Information Updated
CENTER_UPDATED.message: Your center {center.name} information has been successfully updated.
